vernac_cmds: Theorem Zopp_le_cancel : forall x y : Z, (-y <= -x)%Z -> Zle x y.
Theorem Zgt_not_eq : forall x y : Z, (y < x)%Z -> (x <> y)%Z.
Scheme eq_dep_elim := Induction for eq Sort Type.
Definition eqbool_dep P (h1 : P true) b := match b return P b -> Prop with | true => fun (h2 : P true) => h1 = h2 | false => fun (h2 : P false) => False end.
Lemma eqbool_irrelevance : forall (b : bool) (h1 h2 : b = true), h1 = h2.
assert (forall (h : true = true), refl_equal true = h).
Definition Zeven (n : Z) := match n with | Zpos (xO _) => true | Zneg (xO _) => true | Z0 => true | _ => false end.
Theorem Zeven_mult : forall x y, Zeven (x * y) = orb (Zeven x) (Zeven y).
Theorem Zeven_opp : forall x, Zeven (- x) = Zeven x.
Theorem Zeven_ex : forall x, exists p, x = (2 * p + if Zeven x then 0 else 1)%Z.
Theorem Zeven_2xp1 : forall n, Zeven (2 * n + 1) = false.
Theorem Zeven_plus : forall x y, Zeven (x + y) = Bool.eqb (Zeven x) (Zeven y).
replace (2 * px + (if Zeven x then 0 else 1) + (2 * py + (if Zeven y then 0 else 1)))%Z with (2 * (px + py) + ((if Zeven x then 0 else 1) + (if Zeven y then 0 else 1)))%Z by ring.
replace (2 * (px + py) + (1 + 1))%Z with (2 * (px + py + 1))%Z by ring.
Theorem Zpower_plus : forall n k1 k2, (0 <= k1)%Z -> (0 <= k2)%Z -> Zpower n (k1 + k2) = (Zpower n k1 * Zpower n k2)%Z.
intros n k1 k2 H1 H2.
Theorem Zpower_Zpower_nat : forall b e, (0 <= e)%Z -> Zpower b e = Zpower_nat b (Zabs_nat e).
Theorem Zpower_nat_S : forall b e, Zpower_nat b (S e) = (b * Zpower_nat b e)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_pos_gt_0 : forall b p, (0 < b)%Z -> (0 < Zpower_pos b p)%Z.
Theorem Zeven_Zpower : forall b e, (0 < e)%Z -> Zeven (Zpower b e) = Zeven b.
Theorem Zeven_Zpower_odd : forall b e, (0 <= e)%Z -> Zeven b = false -> Zeven (Zpower b e) = false.
Record radix := { radix_val :> Z ; radix_prop : Zle_bool 2 radix_val = true }.
Theorem radix_val_inj : forall r1 r2, radix_val r1 = radix_val r2 -> r1 = r2.
Theorem Zpower_gt_1 : forall p, (0 < p)%Z -> (1 < Zpower r p)%Z.
apply Zle_lt_trans with (1 * Zpower_nat r n)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_gt_0 : forall p, (0 <= p)%Z -> (0 < Zpower r p)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_ge_0 : forall e, (0 <= Zpower r e)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_le : forall e1 e2, (e1 <= e2)%Z -> (Zpower r e1 <= Zpower r e2)%Z.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
Theorem Zpower_lt : forall e1 e2, (0 <= e2)%Z -> (e1 < e2)%Z -> (Zpower r e1 < Zpower r e2)%Z.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
Theorem Zpower_lt_Zpower : forall e1 e2, (Zpower r (e1 - 1) < Zpower r e2)%Z -> (e1 <= e2)%Z.
Theorem Zmod_mod_mult : forall n a b, (0 < a)%Z -> (0 <= b)%Z -> Zmod (Zmod n (a * b)) b = Zmod n b.
Theorem ZOmod_eq : forall a b, Z.rem a b = (a - Z.quot a b * b)%Z.
Theorem ZOmod_mod_mult : forall n a b, Z.rem (Z.rem n (a * b)) b = Z.rem n b.
assert (Z.rem n (a * b) = n + - (Z.quot n (a * b) * a) * b)%Z.
Theorem Zdiv_mod_mult : forall n a b, (0 <= a)%Z -> (0 <= b)%Z -> (Zdiv (Zmod n (a * b)) a) = Zmod (Zdiv n a) b.
intros n a b Ha Hb.
rewrite Z_div_plus by now apply Zlt_gt.
Theorem ZOdiv_mod_mult : forall n a b, (Z.quot (Z.rem n (a * b)) a) = Z.rem (Z.quot n a) b.
assert (Z.rem n (a * b) = n + - (Z.quot (Z.quot n a) b * b) * a)%Z.
Theorem ZOdiv_small_abs : forall a b, (Zabs a < b)%Z -> Z.quot a b = Z0.
Theorem ZOmod_small_abs : forall a b, (Zabs a < b)%Z -> Z.rem a b = a.
Theorem ZOdiv_plus : forall a b c, (0 <= a * b)%Z -> (Z.quot (a + b) c = Z.quot a c + Z.quot b c + Z.quot (Z.rem a c + Z.rem b c) c)%Z.
assert (forall d, Z.quot d c * c = d - Z.rem d c)%Z.
Theorem Zsame_sign_trans : forall v u w, v <> Z0 -> (0 <= u * v)%Z -> (0 <= v * w)%Z -> (0 <= u * w)%Z.
intros [|v|v] [|u|u] [|w|w] Zv Huv Hvw ; try easy ; now elim Zv.
Theorem Zsame_sign_trans_weak : forall v u w, (v = Z0 -> w = Z0) -> (0 <= u * v)%Z -> (0 <= v * w)%Z -> (0 <= u * w)%Z.
intros [|v|v] [|u|u] [|w|w] Zv Huv Hvw ; try easy ; now discriminate Zv.
Theorem Zsame_sign_imp : forall u v, (0 < u -> 0 <= v)%Z -> (0 < -u -> 0 <= -v)%Z -> (0 <= u * v)%Z.
Theorem Zsame_sign_odiv : forall u v, (0 <= v)%Z -> (0 <= u * Z.quot u v)%Z.
Inductive Zeq_bool_prop (x y : Z) : bool -> Prop := | Zeq_bool_true_ : x = y -> Zeq_bool_prop x y true | Zeq_bool_false_ : x <> y -> Zeq_bool_prop x y false.
Theorem Zeq_bool_spec : forall x y, Zeq_bool_prop x y (Zeq_bool x y).
case (Zeq_bool x y) ; intros (H1, H2) ; constructor.
Theorem Zeq_bool_true : forall x y, x = y -> Zeq_bool x y = true.
Theorem Zeq_bool_false : forall x y, x <> y -> Zeq_bool x y = false.
Inductive Zle_bool_prop (x y : Z) : bool -> Prop := | Zle_bool_true_ : (x <= y)%Z -> Zle_bool_prop x y true | Zle_bool_false_ : (y < x)%Z -> Zle_bool_prop x y false.
Theorem Zle_bool_spec : forall x y, Zle_bool_prop x y (Zle_bool x y).
Theorem Zle_bool_true : forall x y : Z, (x <= y)%Z -> Zle_bool x y = true.
Theorem Zle_bool_false : forall x y : Z, (y < x)%Z -> Zle_bool x y = false.
Inductive Zlt_bool_prop (x y : Z) : bool -> Prop := | Zlt_bool_true_ : (x < y)%Z -> Zlt_bool_prop x y true | Zlt_bool_false_ : (y <= x)%Z -> Zlt_bool_prop x y false.
Theorem Zlt_bool_spec : forall x y, Zlt_bool_prop x y (Zlt_bool x y).
Theorem Zlt_bool_true : forall x y : Z, (x < y)%Z -> Zlt_bool x y = true.
Theorem Zlt_bool_false : forall x y : Z, (y <= x)%Z -> Zlt_bool x y = false.
Theorem negb_Zle_bool : forall x y : Z, negb (Zle_bool x y) = Zlt_bool y x.
Theorem negb_Zlt_bool : forall x y : Z, negb (Zlt_bool x y) = Zle_bool y x.

Inductive Zcompare_prop (x y : Z) : comparison -> Prop := | Zcompare_Lt_ : (x < y)%Z -> Zcompare_prop x y Lt | Zcompare_Eq_ : x = y -> Zcompare_prop x y Eq | Zcompare_Gt_ : (y < x)%Z -> Zcompare_prop x y Gt.
Theorem Zcompare_spec : forall x y, Zcompare_prop x y (Zcompare x y).
Theorem Zcompare_Lt : forall x y, (x < y)%Z -> Zcompare x y = Lt.
Theorem Zcompare_Eq : forall x y, (x = y)%Z -> Zcompare x y = Eq.
Theorem Zcompare_Gt : forall x y, (y < x)%Z -> Zcompare x y = Gt.
Definition cond_Zopp (b : bool) m := if b then Zopp m else m.
Theorem abs_cond_Zopp : forall b m, Zabs (cond_Zopp b m) = Zabs m.
Theorem cond_Zopp_Zlt_bool : forall m, cond_Zopp (Zlt_bool m 0) m = Zabs m.
Fixpoint Zfast_pow_pos (v : Z) (e : positive) : Z := match e with | xH => v | xO e' => Z.square (Zfast_pow_pos v e') | xI e' => Zmult v (Z.square (Zfast_pow_pos v e')) end.
Theorem Zfast_pow_pos_correct : forall v e, Zfast_pow_pos v e = Zpower_pos v e.
induction e ; intros v f ; simpl.
Lemma Zdiv_eucl_unique : forall a b, Zdiv_eucl a b = (Zdiv a b, Zmod a b).

Fixpoint Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 (a b : positive) {struct b} := match b with | xO b' => match a with | xO a' => let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a' b' in (q, 2 * r)%Z | xI a' => let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a' b' in (q, 2 * r + 1)%Z | xH => (Z0, Zpos a) end | xH => (Zpos a, Z0) | xI _ => Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b) end.
Lemma Zpos_div_eucl_aux1_correct : forall a b, Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b = Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b~0)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b~0)).
change (Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a~1 b~0) with (let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b in (q, 2 * r + 1)%Z).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).
change (Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a~0 b~0) with (let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b in (q, 2 * r)%Z).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).
Definition Zpos_div_eucl_aux (a b : positive) := match Pos.compare a b with | Lt => (Z0, Zpos a) | Eq => (1%Z, Z0) | Gt => Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b end.
Lemma Zpos_div_eucl_aux_correct : forall a b, Zpos_div_eucl_aux a b = Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).
now rewrite Zdiv_small, Zmod_small by (split ; easy).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).

Definition Zfast_div_eucl (a b : Z) := match a with | Z0 => (0, 0)%Z | Zpos a' => match b with | Z0 => (0, 0)%Z | Zpos b' => Zpos_div_eucl_aux a' b' | Zneg b' => let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux a' b' in match r with | Z0 => (-q, 0)%Z | Zpos _ => (-(q + 1), (b + r))%Z | Zneg _ => (-(q + 1), (b + r))%Z end end | Zneg a' => match b with | Z0 => (0, 0)%Z | Zpos b' => let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux a' b' in match r with | Z0 => (-q, 0)%Z | Zpos _ => (-(q + 1), (b - r))%Z | Zneg _ => (-(q + 1), (b - r))%Z end | Zneg b' => let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux a' b' in (q, (-r)%Z) end end.
Theorem Zfast_div_eucl_correct : forall a b : Z, Zfast_div_eucl a b = Zdiv_eucl a b.
Fixpoint iter_nat (n : nat) (x : A) {struct n} : A := match n with | S n' => iter_nat n' (f x) | O => x end.
Lemma iter_nat_plus : forall (p q : nat) (x : A), iter_nat (p + q) x = iter_nat p (iter_nat q x).
Lemma iter_nat_S : forall (p : nat) (x : A), iter_nat (S p) x = f (iter_nat p x).
Fixpoint iter_pos (n : positive) (x : A) {struct n} : A := match n with | xI n' => iter_pos n' (iter_pos n' (f x)) | xO n' => iter_pos n' (iter_pos n' x) | xH => f x end.
Lemma iter_pos_nat : forall (p : positive) (x : A), iter_pos p x = iter_nat (Pos.to_nat p) x.

command: assert (forall (h : true = true), refl_equal true = h).
replace (2 * px + (if Zeven x then 0 else 1) + (2 * py + (if Zeven y then 0 else 1)))%Z with (2 * (px + py) + ((if Zeven x then 0 else 1) + (if Zeven y then 0 else 1)))%Z by ring.
replace (2 * (px + py) + (1 + 1))%Z with (2 * (px + py + 1))%Z by ring.
intros n k1 k2 H1 H2.
apply Zle_lt_trans with (1 * Zpower_nat r n)%Z.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
assert (Z.rem n (a * b) = n + - (Z.quot n (a * b) * a) * b)%Z.
intros n a b Ha Hb.
rewrite Z_div_plus by now apply Zlt_gt.
assert (Z.rem n (a * b) = n + - (Z.quot (Z.quot n a) b * b) * a)%Z.
assert (forall d, Z.quot d c * c = d - Z.rem d c)%Z.
intros [|v|v] [|u|u] [|w|w] Zv Huv Hvw ; try easy ; now elim Zv.
intros [|v|v] [|u|u] [|w|w] Zv Huv Hvw ; try easy ; now discriminate Zv.
case (Zeq_bool x y) ; intros (H1, H2) ; constructor.
induction e ; intros v f ; simpl.
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b~0)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b~0)).
change (Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a~1 b~0) with (let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b in (q, 2 * r + 1)%Z).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).
change (Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a~0 b~0) with (let (q, r) := Zpos_div_eucl_aux1 a b in (q, 2 * r)%Z).
change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).

change (Z.pos_div_eucl a (Zpos b)) with (Zdiv_eucl (Zpos a) (Zpos b)).
